tool.name: mtbls520_01_mtbls_download
tool.description: Download private MTBLS study via https.

param.name: id
param.label: MetaboLights ID
param.help: Enter the MetaboLights ID here, e.g. 520.

param.name: token
param.label: MetaboLights Token
param.help: Enter the Secret MetaboLights Token here, e.g. aabbccdd-1122-4455-66ff-f0e0d0c0b0a0.

tool.help: This is the MTBLS520 study. The study will be published soon. This code is work-in-progress. Do not redistribute unless study published. Copyright (C) 2017 Kristian Peters - IPB Halle ---- More updates soon
